Text:
Valentine's Day. After successfully managing to give
Cid her chocolates, Alpha spends time having tea
alone with him.
These chocolates really are delicious.
Heheh. I'm glad to hear you say that.

Whew! I'm full! You guys might be weaklings, but the
meat and potatoes you make are super yummy!
*sigh* Keeping Delta here was tough.

But we managed it. I'm impressed by your quick
thinking, Omega.

Yes. Thanks to you, Lady Alpha was able to have some
alone time with Master Shadow.

That said, I wonder if everything went well in the
end... It's a bit intrusive, but let's take a peek.

I knew you were capable of anything, but who
would've thought making sweets was on that list as
well? Maybe you could start your own patisserie.

You're flattering me. I only managed to make these
chocolates because Lambda helped.

Wow, Lambda is good at cooking? That's kinda
unexpected.

She apparently did a lot of research for the
occasion. She gave me lots of advice while
making them.

But it wasn't just Lambda. All the others pitched
in for today.

For instance, the tea we're drinking now was
selected by Nu. She chose a blend that goes
best with my chocolates.
Hmm. No wonder it smells nice.

Doesn't it? She gave me her recommendation from
a wide variety of blends.

It wasn't just the tea and chocolates. The others
helped me in lots of different ways. I wouldn't have
been able to hand you the chocolate if it wasn't for
them.

...Are you sure this is okay? It sounds like we're
the main topic of conversation...

I thought they would talk about each other more and
deepen their bond...

From the tone of Lady Alpha's voice, she definitely
sounds relaxed.

But they finally got some alone time together.
Isn't this a bit of a wasteful way to spend it?
Lady Alpha...
...And then, I got a great idea from—

Kinda feels like...you're just talking about the
others.

Huh? But, I was able to give you the chocolates
thanks to their help...

But, it was you who acted on it. You should take
more pride in yourself. I wanna hear more about
you.
About me...?

Yeah. You've been a leader ever since you were a
kid, and you always put others first.

But I want to take this opportunity to hear more
about you. Go on, I'll listen.
Cid...!

(Yes, now that she's fully immersed in this
"shadowbroker" play, I'm eager to hear her
firsthand thoughts!)

I appreciate you always putting up with me, Alpha.
So, it's the least I can do for you today.

...I feel the same way. I'm always deeply grateful
to you.

Shadow, thank you for always guiding me. I hope you
will let me continue walking alongside you.
Of course! Looking forward to it.

(She might not realize it, but she's the most
enthusiastic about all of this. Looking forward to
more great performances from you, Alpha!)
L-Lady Alpha's gratitude...reached Master Shadow...!
Lambda, are you crying?
...I'm not crying.

I understand why you're emotional. You were
supporting her the most after all.

...It's not about me. We should just be happy for
Lady Alpha...

You're right. Her feelings of gratitude for Master
Shadow have finally been reciprocated.
I look forward to what the future has in store.

Nothing makes me happier than walking by your side.
Honestly, truly... Heheh.
